error.message: Call to deprecated function module_load_include(). Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. Use Drupal::moduleHandler()->loadInclude($module, $type, $name = NULL). Note that including code from uninstalled extensions is no longer supported.

Call to deprecated method mimeHeaderEncode() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:9.2.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use \Symfony\Component\Mime\Header\UnstructuredHeader instead.
Call to deprecated method stopPropagation() of class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead
